info.name: Facebook - Blue-Gray Background
info.description:
Changes the background color to Blue-Gray, the links to mediumblue and the text to black.

Applies also to the Facebook Comments plugin.

It goes well with my style 33602.

See also my :
style 75311.
and style 63176
info.additionalInfo:
2012-12-17 added facebook profile Timeline
2012-02-21 fixed the Timeline
2012-06-24 fixed the profile pop-up window
2012-10-13 fixed the facebook comments plugin
2013-04-08 fixed Timeline (fb is now rolling out a big change in the timeline layout)
2015-04-06 changed some colors
